titleStmt.title: A frutfull sermon of the moost euangelicall wryter M. Luther, made of the angelles vpo[n] the. xviii. chapi. of Mathew translated out of laten in to Englyshe
Predigt von den Engeln. English.
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.
Foxe, John, 1516-1587.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules churche yerde, at the syngne of saynt Augustyne by [J. Mychell for] Hugh Syngleton,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Eine Predigt von den Engeln.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Actual printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC (addendum).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
